name: Transgender Law Center
description: Transgender Law Center provides legal resources and legal services for transgender identified clients. Clients can contact the Legal Help Desk for advice on how to address legal issues.
fullDescription: Transgender Law Center provides legal resources and legal services for transgender identified clients. Clients can contact the Legal Help Desk for advice on how to address legal issues.
whatTheyOffer: Transgender Law Center provides legal resources and legal services for transgender identified clients. Clients can contact the Legal Help Desk for advice on how to address legal issues.
